string.text:
A small wooden door with tattered papers posted on it, measuring 1 meter by 1.9 meters.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Compatible with the craftable doorways
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]To remove door, damage it with a melee weapon.

A large, rusty metal door that was once painted a pristine white, measuring 1.5 meters by 2.5 meters.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]To remove door, damage it with a melee weapon.

A sunbleached wooden door built with notable craftsmanship.easures 1.15 meters by 2.15 meters.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]To remove door, damage it with a melee weapon.

A simple, sunbleached wooden door. Shows signs of rot at the bottom due to potential water damage. Measures 1.45 meters by 2.2 meters.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]To remove door, damage it with a melee weapon.

A very large reinforced door assembled in the Zone from planks and thick scrap metal, measuring 1.76 meters by 3 meters.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]To remove door, damage it with a melee weapon.
